alfredsnippet.snippet:
#!/bin/bash
dir_download_txt="{clipboard}"
file_name=$(basename "$dir_download_txt" .txt)
dir=$(dirname "$dir_download_txt")
temp_folder="$dir/$file_name"
mkdir -p "$temp_folder"
wget -i "$dir_download_txt" -P "$temp_folder"

cd "$temp_folder"

for f in *; do echo "file '$f'" >> concat.txt; done

output_file="$dir/$file_name.mp4"
ffmpeg -f concat -safe 0 -i concat.txt -c copy "$output_file"
alfredsnippet.name: Merge TXT(download) into mp4
